definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Are you going to the tailgate party this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 你今天下午要去足球赛前的聚会吗？

sentences.english: As soon as the gates were opened, crowds of football supporters piled in.
sentences.chinese: 门一打开，成群的为足球赛呐喊助威的人涌了进来。

sentences.english: The football match (being) over， crowds of people poured out into the street.
sentences.chinese: 足球赛五结束，从群便涌到大街上。

sentences.english: Did you watch the football game in Wutaishan stadium last night ?
sentences.chinese: 你昨晚去五台山体育馆看足球赛了吗？

sentences.english: There is a football match at Jinling Primary School every Friday.
sentences.chinese: 每星期五在金岭小学有一场足球赛。

sentences.english: But generally most of the games I see are televised with football.
sentences.chinese: 但通常，我看的大多数比赛都是电视转播的足球赛。

sentences.english: A heavy downpour interrupted the football match.
sentences.chinese: 一场骤雨中断了这场足球赛。

sentences.english: 6-6. Anyone who has played even in a school football match knows this.
sentences.chinese: 即使是仅参加过学校足球赛的人也有这种体会。

sentences.english: This exciting football match is sponsored by Marlboro.
sentences.chinese: 这场精彩的足球赛是由万宝露赞助的。

sentences.english: We just watched an exciting football match.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚看了一场激动人心的足球赛。

sentences.english: The football match is the longest and most unexcitable of matches.
sentences.chinese: 这场足球赛是时间最长，最难以使人激动的球赛。

sentences.english: I follow English football on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 我在网上跟踪了解英国足球赛况。

sentences.english: We beat Class Four in the football match yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天足球赛我们打败了四班队。

sentences.english: This ticket admits two people to the football match.
sentences.chinese: 这张票可供两人入场看足球赛。

sentences.english: The foot-ball is on TV in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 足球赛晚上在电视上播。

sentences.english: Are you doing the football pools, Brian?
sentences.chinese: 布来恩，你正在下足球赛的赌注吗？

definition: abbr. for 男子足球 men's soccer/abbr. for 男子足球隊|男子足球队 men's soccer team
invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
